mapper.select: SELECT menu_seq as menuSeq, menu_name as menuName, menu_description as menuDescription, connect_menu as connectMenu, must_yn as mustYn FROM tb_group_menu WHERE menu_type=#{menu_type} ORDER BY menu_seq asc ;

SELECT group_seq as groupSeq, group_name as groupName, member_seq as memberSeq, company_seq as companySeq, menu_large as menuLarge, menu_medium as menuMedium, menu_function as menuFunction FROM tb_group_user WHERE member_seq != 0 AND company_seq = 0
AND group_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
UNION SELECT group_seq as groupSeq, group_name as groupName, member_seq as memberSeq, company_seq as companySeq, menu_large as menuLarge, menu_medium as menuMedium, menu_function as menuFunction FROM tb_group_user WHERE member_seq=0 AND company_seq=0 AND member_gb is not null
AND group_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY groupSeq desc, groupName desc LIMIT #{startNo}, 10 ;
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_group_user WHERE group_name=#{groupName} ;
SELECT group_seq as groupSeq, group_name as groupName, menu_medium as menuMedium, menu_function as menuFunction, member_gb as memberGb FROM tb_group_user WHERE group_seq=#{groupSeq} ;

member_gb is not null
member_gb is null
